3: In the ashen city, a girl sits on a broken beam in front of the ruins, her head swinging from one side to the other as she recites dialogues from who-knows-where.
Even though we are in this apocalyptic urban jungle, and it is not an easy quest, we still have to gain it!
Gain what?
Victory! I mean victory!
She jumps down from the ruins, nodding with her hands on her hips.
Beside her are some mechanoids who somehow show no signs of infection.
So... Why did you call a bunch of mechanoids here all of a sudden?
No, you're doing it wrong! We should start with introductions. Hi, I'm Nanami, nice to meet you!
Well, I'm Martin...
Nooo, you are... you are a knight!
Knight? What knight?
The knight I appointed! Just now!
...Right.
Archer—Rohacchi!
Rohacchi, an archer.
There seems to be a medieval roleplaying game somewhere in the M.I.N.D. What's it called? I remembered the keyword is... right, it's assassins!
Good, you are the assassins. What else... Hmm... Guard!
That one over there, right, you're the guard!
It seems that your 'third partner' can't understand what you're saying...
Don't worry about it!
Anyway, can you see the tower over there?
She points at a gray tower behind her, its spire hidden in the cloudy sky, its top concealed.
You are not climbing that, are you?
You got me! Come on, Nanami's army, let's march to the top of the tower!
So, is this some kind of roleplaying game...
It should have a name. How about '50 Levels of Gray Tower'?
Do Rohacchi, go too?
All of you are going!
Nanami puts her hand up, and the mechanoids around her respond by gently swaying along with her movement.
The path to victory is to strategically capture each level of the Gray Tower and save the trapped princess...
Is there a real princess up there?
Maybe! It has to be something special, nonetheless!
As long as, I stay with you.
I guess I'll treat it as cleaning up the city...
Great!
So, say goodbye to this place! We'll be victorious with our might and skills! Nanami's army, charge!
